description:
When Albert Salvi founded our law firm, Salvi & Maher, L.L.C., in 1991, he did so with the goal of providing representation to the victims of negligence living in Northern Illinois. Today, 24 years later, he and our firm's other three attorneys, Michael Maher, Kathy Salvi and George Tamvakis, continue to work toward that original goal by serving the people of Lake, Cook, McHenry, Kane, Kendall and Will counties from the firm's four office locations serving the Greater Chicago area.

At our law firm, we focus our practice on assisting injured victims and their families as they pursue personal injury or wrongful death compensation due to the following:

• Motor vehicle and recreational vehicle accidents

• Medical malpractice and nursing home negligence

• Workplace accidents

• Public transport accidents

• Premises liability

• Defective products

Regardless of the accident, product, dangerous condition or negligent act that caused you or your loved one's injuries, the attorneys at Salvi & Maher, L.L.C., will work diligently as they pursue compensation for you, just as they have for so many other Illinois residents over the past 24 years. If you are interested in learning more about how our law firm helps our clients get their lives back on track after accidents, you can take advantage of our offer for a free initial consultation.
